alert.note: Alert for Harper (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 12:13PM CDT until May 29 at 11:17AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Areas of low-land flooding caused by heavy rainfall the past 3 days. Various rural roads remain flooded in spots. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Kansas, including the following county, Harper. * WHEN...Until noon CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Various low-water crossings may not be passable. Expect areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1208 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported some rural roads remain flooded in spots across the county due to heavy rainfall the past 3 days.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
